sys_script_include.description: Script Include to return an E-Mail address. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a User table record.
sys_script_include.name: GetEmailAdress

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a011cdf707121010be54ff4c7c1ed0ae
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetEmailAdress</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script Include to return an E-Mail address. The calling client-side script passes a sys_id for a User table record.</description><name>GetEmailAdress</name><script><![CDATA[var GetEmailAdress = Class.create();

// Extends the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetEmailAdress.prototype =
	Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	// Define the getEmail function.
	// Create a custom GlideRecord for the User table.
	// Use the sysparm_userID passed in from the client to retrieve a record from the User table.
	// Return the E-Mail address for the requested record.
		getEmail: function() {
			var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sysparm_user");
			userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
			return userRecord.email + '';
		},
    type: 'GetEmailAdress'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-05 00:04:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>a011cdf707121010be54ff4c7c1ed0ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetEmailAdress</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a011cdf707121010be54ff4c7c1ed0ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-05 00:04:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
